```{bash}
wget -O ecoli ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/genomes/archive/old_refseq/Bacteria/Escherichia_coli_K_12_substr__MG1655_uid57779/NC_000913.faa 
```

```{bash}
#How many proteins are there
cat ecoli | grep -c \>
```

```{bash}
#how many amino acids are there
cat ecoli | grep -v "^>" |tr -d "\n" |wc -c
```
```{bash}
##divide amino acids by n proteins
echo $(cat ecoli | grep -v "^>" |tr -d "\n" |wc -c)/ $(cat ecoli | grep -c \>) |bc
``` 


```{bash}
##to perform this task for any given .faa file in directory
for file in *.faa;

do
echo $(cat $file | grep -v "^>" |tr -d "\n" |wc -c)/ $(cat $file | grep -c \>) |bc;
done

```
